table.name: crm_form_field
table.comment: Defines form field and its attributes.

field.name: form_group_id
field.comment: FK to form_group, assigns field to visual/display grouping.

field.name: name
field.comment: Variable name/programmatic handle for this property.

field.name: type
field.values: Text, TextArea, Select, Radio, CheckBox, Select Date, Select State / Province, Select Country
field.comment: HTML types plus several built-in extended types.

field.name: mask
field.comment: Optional format instructions for specific field types, like date types.

field.name: attributes
field.comment: Store collection of type-appropriate attributes, e.g. textarea needs rows/cols attributes

field.name: default_value
field.comment: Use form_options.is_default for field_types which use options.

field.name: help_pre
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display before fields in group.

field.name: help_post
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display after fields in group.
